title: The Sherlock Holmes Novels - BBC Radio - Set 1 - SeymourDAC
description:
This set begins a run of eight sets which include every Sherlock Holmes story written by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, The Further Adventures written by Bert Coules and Loren D Estleman&#039;s Sherlock Holmes versus Dracula.

The Sherlock Holmes Novels by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.
Dramatised for radio by Bert Coules. Starring Clive Merrison as Sherlock Holmes & Michael Williams as Doctor John Watson.

Each of the four stories are made up of two 60-minute episodes. Total running time approximately 8 hours.

A Study in Scarlet (published 1887)
Our heroes meet for the first time. Very soon they&#039;re investigating a murder.

The Sign of The Four (published 1890)
A stolen treasure and a secret pact between four ex-convicts brings tragedy into Miss Mary Morstan&#039;s life.

The Hound of the Baskervilles (published 1901-1902)
Can our heroes save Sir Henry Baskerville, the last of the Baskervilles, from the legendary beast?

The Valley of Fear (published 1914-1915)
Revenge and treachery link a Sussex country house with the sinister secret societies of 1890s industrial America.

My recordings from BBC7 at 160kbps CBR joint-stereo mp3, encoded with LAME.
Recorded from Freeview -> DVD Recorder -> MP3.

Have fun & please seed.

SeymourDAC
